Class turboRegTransform

java.lang.Object
  turboRegTransform

 class turboRegTransform
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the algorithmic methods of the plugin. It refines the landmarks and computes the final images.

Field Detail

FEW_ITERATIONS

private static final int FEW_ITERATIONS
Maximal number of registration iterations per level, when speed is requested at the expense of accuracy. This number must be corrected so that there are more iterations at the coarse levels of the pyramid than at the fine levels.

See Also:
ITERATION_PROGRESSION, Constant Field Values

FIRST_LAMBDA

private static final double FIRST_LAMBDA
Initial value of the Marquardt-Levenberg fudge factor.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

LAMBDA_MAGSTEP

private static final double LAMBDA_MAGSTEP
Update parameter of the Marquardt-Levenberg fudge factor.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MANY_ITERATIONS

private static final int MANY_ITERATIONS
Maximal number of registration iterations per level, when accuracy is requested at the expense of speed. This number must be corrected so that there are more iterations at the coarse levels of the pyramid than at the fine levels.

See Also:
ITERATION_PROGRESSION, Constant Field Values

PIXEL_HIGH_PRECISION

private static final double PIXEL_HIGH_PRECISION
Minimal update distance of the landmarks, in pixel units, when accuracy is requested at the expense of speed. This distance does not depend on the pyramid level.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PIXEL_LOW_PRECISION

private static final double PIXEL_LOW_PRECISION
Minimal update distance of the landmarks, in pixel units, when speed is requested at the expense of accuracy. This distance does not depend on the pyramid level.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ITERATION_PROGRESSION

private static final int ITERATION_PROGRESSION
Multiplicative factor that determines how many more iterations are allowed for a pyramid level one unit coarser.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

turboRegTransform

public turboRegTransform(turboRegImage sourceImg,
                         turboRegMask sourceMsk,
                         turboRegPointHandler sourcePh,
                         turboRegImage targetImg,
                         turboRegMask targetMsk,
                         turboRegPointHandler targetPh,
                         int transformation,
                         boolean accelerated,
                         boolean interactive)
Keep a local copy of most everything. Select among the pre-stored constants.

Parameters:
targetImg - Target image pyramid.
targetMsk - Target mask pyramid.
sourceImg - Source image pyramid.
sourceMsk - Source mask pyramid.
targetPh - Target turboRegPointHandler object.
sourcePh - Source turboRegPointHandler object.
transformation - Transformation code.
accelerated - Trade-off between speed and accuracy.
interactive - Shows or hides the resulting image.
Method Detail

appendTransformation

public void appendTransformation(java.lang.String pathAndFilename)
Append the current landmarks into a text file. Rigid format.

Parameters:
pathAndFilename - Path and name of the file where batch results are being written.
